data.title: The Cay
data.meta_description: the cay - Free download as (.rtf), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The novel The Cay by Theodore Taylor follows 11-year-old Phillip and his companion Timothy as they become stranded on a small island after their boat sinks during World War 2. Phillip starts out as a racist boy but learns compassion from Timothy, an elderly Black man. They work together to survive on the island and overcome prejudices so that Phillip can return home a kinder person with new understanding.
